item.sql:
WITH t AS ( SELECT DISTINCT (oar_area_id) oar_area_id FROM (SELECT odd_id FROM sys_org_dept_dtls START WITH odd_id = :org CONNECT BY PRIOR odd_id = odd_parent_id UNION ALL SELECT 3 odd_id FROM DUAL) INNER JOIN com_org_area_rltn ON odd_id = oar_dept_id )
SELECT WM_CONCAT( id ) id FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT(cbd_id) id FROM t INNER JOIN cmr_camera_base_dtls ON cbd_area_id = oar_area_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT das_dvc_id, das_dvc_type FROM com_dvc_auth_set WHERE das_dvc_type = 1 AND das_user_id = :user ) ON cbd_id = das_dvc_id WHERE das_dvc_id is null
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT(dbd_id) id FROM t INNER JOIN dor_door_base_dtls ON dbd_area_id = oar_area_id LEFT JOIN com_dvc_auth_set ON dbd_id = das_dvc_id WHERE das_dvc_type=2 AND das_user_id = :user
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT(tbd_id) id FROM t INNER JOIN tbk_talkback_base_dtls ON tbd_area_id = oar_area_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT das_dvc_id, das_dvc_type FROM com_dvc_auth_set WHERE das_dvc_type = 3 AND das_user_id = :user ) ON tbd_id = das_dvc_id WHERE das_dvc_id is null
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT(bbd_id) id FROM t INNER JOIN bct_broadcast_base_dtls ON bbd_area_id = oar_area_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT das_dvc_id, das_dvc_type FROM com_dvc_auth_set WHERE das_dvc_type = 4 AND das_user_id = :user ) ON bbd_id = das_dvc_id WHERE das_dvc_id is null UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT(nbd_id) id FROM t INNER JOIN alt_network_base_dtls ON nbd_area_id = oar_area_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT das_dvc_id, das_dvc_type FROM com_dvc_auth_set WHERE das_dvc_type = 6 AND das_user_id = :user ) ON nbd_id = das_dvc_id WHERE das_dvc_id is null
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT(wam_id) id FROM t INNER JOIN dvc_wireless_alarm_master ON wam_area_id = oar_area_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT das_dvc_id, das_dvc_type FROM com_dvc_auth_set WHERE das_dvc_type = 17 AND das_user_id = :user ) ON wam_id = das_dvc_id WHERE das_dvc_id is null )
